title: Darjeeling limited typeface.
content:
Hello,

Yesterday, I watched the delicious [Darjeeling limited](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311184208/http:/www.imdb.com/title/tt0838221/).

At the end of the film, I thought the typeface was perfect for the titles (even if the yellow was unreadable) but hey, whatthefont ?  
I googled it quickly, to see if someone on earth already asked himself the same question.

The [answer was here](http://web.archive.org/web/20150311184208/http:/typophile.com/node/36831), on typophile.

I'm not alone, thanks.
author: laurent
